TopicTitle: Please make all key bindings remappable including VAB assembly keys

Articles.Content:
Obviously this is a big deal to people but in the VAB, something that is driving me absolutely crazy is that every time I accidentally right click when im trying to drag or hold, the parts manager lags everything out while it loads in. Whenever the parts manager is open, it creates a huge amount of lag in general so it should not be so easy to open it and it's not like you have to open it so frequently that it even needs to be on the RMB anyway IMO.

Thank you.
